thought.text: I'll help you implement the necessary changes to fix the issue with binary payload requests. Let me start by following the phases you outlined.

task_list.title: Phase 2: RUNNING - Set up and run tests
Phase 4: TEST CREATION - Create reproduction script
Phase 5: FIX ANALYSIS - Analyze the problem and solution
Phase 6: FIX IMPLEMENTATION - Implement the fix

function.arguments: {"command": "plan", "security_risk": "LOW", "task_list": [{"title": "Phase 1: READING - Understand the problem", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 2: RUNNING - Set up and run tests", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 3: EXPLORATION - Find related files", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 4: TEST CREATION - Create reproduction script", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 5: FIX ANALYSIS - Analyze the problem and solution", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 6: FIX IMPLEMENTATION - Implement the fix", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 7: VERIFICATION - Test the implementation", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 8: FINAL REVIEW - Comprehensive testing", "status": "todo"}]}
function.name: task_tracker
